analysis: Market analysis indicates negative pressure with sellers in control. RSI at 52.56 remains in neutral territory. Money Flow Index at 58.00 suggests balanced volume distribution. MACD showing trend transition, awaiting confirmation. Price trading below Bollinger lower band, indicating potential oversold bounce. Technical structure favors downside with price below key support levels. Ichimoku structure confirms bearish environment. Stochastic at 80.88 warns of overbought exhaustion.
